description: Try our easy to follow Toasted Muesli With Coconut Chips recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Toasted Muesli With Coconut Chips Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Mix together the oats, coconut chips, sunflower and pumpkin seeds, flaked almonds and hazelnuts in a large bowl.

Transfer half the muesli mixture to a separate bowl. Mix the maple syrup and oil together in a jug, then pour over the remaining half of the muesli and toss really well to lightly coat all the ingredients.

Line a large roasting tin with baking parchment, scatter over the syrup-coated muesli and spread out in a single layer. Bake in a preheated oven, 150°C for 15-20 minutes, stirring occasionally, until golden and crisp.
Leave to cool completely, then toss with the uncooked muesli and the dried fruit. Store in airtight storage jars. Serve with soya milk and raspberries.
